Package com.harmonia.backend.service

Class UserService

java.lang.Object
com.harmonia.backend.service.UserService
@Service public class UserService extends Object
Service class for managing users.
Version:
1.0
Author:
Harmonia Team

      Lists users by username.
      Parameters:
      userName - username to search for.
      Returns:
      iterable of user responses.

    • addUser

      public User addUser(User user)
      Adds a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the user to add.
      Returns:
      the added user.

    • createUser

      public UserResponse createUser(CreateUserRequest user)
      Creates a new user.
      Parameters:
      user - the create user request.
      Returns:
      the created user response.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the username is already taken or if not all fields are filled.

    • findByUsernameAndPassword

      public UserResponse findByUsernameAndPassword(String username, String password)
      Finds a user by username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to find.
      password - the password to match.
      Returns:
      the user response if found and authenticated, null otherwise.

    • findByUsername

      public UserResponse findByUsername(String username)
      Finds a user by username.
      Parameters:
      username - the username to find.
      Returns:
      the user response if found, null otherwise.

    • findUserById

      public UserResponse findUserById(Long userId)
      Retrieves a User from the UserRepository by its ID and returns a UserResponse containing the retrieved User.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the User to retrieve.
      Returns:
      A UserResponse containing the retrieved User.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if the User cannot be found in the UserRepository.

    • deleteUser

      public void deleteUser(Long userId)
      Deletes a User from the UserRepository by its ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the User to delete.

    • editUser

      public UserResponse editUser(Long userId, User user)
      Edits a User in the UserRepository with the provided User data and returns a UserResponse containing the edited User.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the User to edit.
      user - The User object containing the updated User data.
      Returns:
      A UserResponse containing the edited User.

    • changePassword

      public UserResponse changePassword(Long userId, String newPassword)
      Changes the password of a User in the UserRepository and returns a UserResponse containing the updated User.
      Parameters:
      userId - The ID of the User to change the password of.
      newPassword - The new password for the User.
      Returns:
      A UserResponse containing the updated User with the new password.
